title: The Business Case for Cultivating Empathy
description: Far from “soft,” empathy is an important business skill that fuels great businesses and brands, increases retention, drives profits, and supports employees’ wellbeing.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Far from “soft,” empathy is an important business skill that fuels great businesses and brands, increases retention, drives profits, and supports employees’ wellbeing.
